about.title: What is Grison-Club?
about.description1: Grison-Club is a Guinean association committed to education, culture, environmental protection, and training young volunteer leaders to serve their communities. Through educational workshops, reforestation campaigns, cultural projects, and humanitarian actions, we work to strengthen youth skills and build resilient communities.
about.description2: In partnership with affiliated clubs in Guinea and internationally, we organize dozens of local and international projects each year, mobilizing over 500 active members and hundreds of volunteers. Our regional delegations coordinate initiatives such as mobile libraries, leadership seminars, and sanitation operations, while our international network promotes solidarity between Africa, Europe, and beyond. Our goal? To train engaged citizens capable of contributing to sustainable and inclusive development.
